short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add OpenAI based helper tools to NetSuite.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ZooKeeper enhances the NetSuite user interface, helping you complete your daily tasks in NetSuite in an easier and more efficient manner. Whether you need help navigating NetSuite, searching a page or list, finding field IDs, or are even looking for NetSuite answers, ZooKeeper can help!

This Chrome extension houses a growing collection of modules that enhance your experience of NetSuite. Today these tools include: 

- Toggle Field IDs
- Search Record Body Fields
- NetSuite navigation assistance
- OpenAI generated “How-To” help responses
- On-page List Search
 
These enhancement modules appear seamlessly in NetSuite as intuitive search bars and checkboxes, making it easy for NetSuite users to benefit from ZooKeeper on day one!

------------

Sponsored by Anchor Group
ZooKeeper is now sponsored by Anchor Group NetSuite Consultants and Developers! Certain search features in ZooKeeper leverage AI bots in training, and we know that AI bots can get confused from time to time. Alongside the AI generated responses, ZooKeeper provides a link to a contact form that allows you to reach out to the Anchor Group team to get a response from a human if needed!
